metadata.title: CVE-2015-0778 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
osc before 0.151.0 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commandsvia shell metacharacters in a _service file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0778` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

osc - 0.151.2-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: osc package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.151.2-2').
